description: Detects known sensitive file extensions via Zeek
false_positives: Help Desk operator doing backup or re-imaging end user machine or pentest or backup software
Users working with these data types or exchanging message files
name: Suspicious Access to Sensitive File Extensions - Zeek
query: (event.dataset:"smb_files" AND file.name:(*.pst OR *.ost OR *.msg OR *.nst OR *.oab OR *.edb OR *.nsf OR *.bak OR *.dmp OR *.kirbi OR *\\groups.xml OR *.rdp))
author: Samir Bousseaden
@neu5ron
